name: Ganjah Defense
description: Ganjah Tower Defense will be a mobile tower defense game which is themed around marijuana. Many different types of law enforcements will navigate along the map and try to infiltrate your marijuana farm. If they get enough of your weed, you lose. To stop them, you may place defenses inspired by stoners such as joint cannons, deadly grinders, bong mortars, etc. This game is being developed purely by a small team of indie developers and the goal is to be our first venture into the world of mobile games.
